trans-unit.source: ATA Database Management | Microsoft ATA
trans-unit.target: ATA Database Management | Microsoft ATA

trans-unit.source: Procedures to help you move, backup, or restore the ATA database.
trans-unit.target: Procedures to help you move, backup, or restore the ATA database.

trans-unit.source: Applies to: Advanced Threat Analytics version 1.7
trans-unit.target: Applies to: Advanced Threat Analytics version 1.7

trans-unit.source: ATA Database Management
trans-unit.target: ATA Database Management

trans-unit.source: If you need to move, backup or restore the ATA database, use these procedures for working with MongoDB.
trans-unit.target: If you need to move, backup or restore the ATA database, use these procedures for working with MongoDB.

trans-unit.source: Backing up the ATA database
trans-unit.target: Backing up the ATA database

trans-unit.source: Refer to the [relevant MongoDB documentation](http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/administration/backup/).
trans-unit.target: Refer to the [relevant MongoDB documentation](http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/administration/backup/).

trans-unit.source: Restoring the ATA database
trans-unit.target: Restoring the ATA database

trans-unit.source: Refer to the [relevant MongoDB documentation](http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/administration/backup/).
trans-unit.target: Refer to the [relevant MongoDB documentation](http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/administration/backup/).

trans-unit.source: Moving the ATA database to another drive
trans-unit.target: Moving the ATA database to another drive

trans-unit.source: Stop the **Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Center** service.
trans-unit.target: Stop the **Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Center** service.

trans-unit.source: Stop the **MongoDB** service.
trans-unit.target: Stop the **MongoDB** service.

trans-unit.source: Open the Mongo configuration file located by default at: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center\MongoDB\bin\mongod.cfg.
trans-unit.target: Open the Mongo configuration file located by default at: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center\MongoDB\bin\mongod.cfg.

trans-unit.source: Find the parameter
trans-unit.target: Find the parameter

trans-unit.source: Move the folder listed in the `dbPath` parameter to the new location.
trans-unit.target: Move the folder listed in the `dbPath` parameter to the new location.

trans-unit.source: Change the `dbPath` parameter inside the mongo configuration file to the new folder path and save and close the file.
trans-unit.target: Change the `dbPath` parameter inside the mongo configuration file to the new folder path and save and close the file.

trans-unit.source: Modify MongoDB configuration image
trans-unit.target: Modify MongoDB configuration image

trans-unit.source: Start the **MongoDB** service.
trans-unit.target: Start the **MongoDB** service.

trans-unit.source: Start the **Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Center** service.
trans-unit.target: Start the **Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Center** service.

trans-unit.source: ATA Configuration file
trans-unit.target: ATA Configuration file

trans-unit.source: The configuration of ATA is stored in the "SystemProfile" collection in the database.
trans-unit.target: The configuration of ATA is stored in the "SystemProfile" collection in the database.

trans-unit.source: This collection is backed up every hour by the ATA Center service to files called: "SystemProfile_*timestamp*.json".
trans-unit.target: This collection is backed up every hour by the ATA Center service to files called: "SystemProfile_*timestamp*.json".

trans-unit.source: The most recent 10 versions are stored.
trans-unit.target: The most recent 10 versions are stored.

trans-unit.source: This is located in a subfolder called "Backup".
trans-unit.target: This is located in a subfolder called "Backup".

trans-unit.source: In the default ATA installed location it can be found here: *C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center\Backup\SystemProfile_*timestamp*.json*.
trans-unit.target: In the default ATA installed location it can be found here: *C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center\Backup\SystemProfile_*timestamp*.json*.

trans-unit.source: **Note**: It is recommended that you back up this file somewhere when making major changes to ATA.
trans-unit.target: **Note**: It is recommended that you back up this file somewhere when making major changes to ATA.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to restore all the settings by running the following command:
trans-unit.target: It is possible to restore all the settings by running the following command:
